DOC.brief_summary: The main goal study determine association : - quantity mother 's milk duration breastfeed - intake polyunsaturated fatty acid iron hospitalization development preterm infant bear GA < 32 week .
DOC.brief_title: Early Nutrition Neurological Development Very Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : infant gestational age < 32 week already include EPIPAGE2 study agreement parent Exclusion criterion : death hospitalisation
